review: She is a thorough professional, competent  doctor. Consulted her for RCT treatment. It was a painless procedure. Fully satisfied. I recommend and wish her all success
reply_text:
Dear Patron
Thank you for your kind words and your recommendation. Apart from delivering painless dentistry, providing personalized care and ensuring our patients' well-being is our top priority. We are here to assist and serve with any dental needs you might have in the future.
Kind regards

review:
It's been a wonderful timing with Dr meenu who has been extremely helpful with my case and shown extended dedication. 

I was searching for a specialised dentist who could handle my case as I have suffered some dental treatment failures before. 
So upon some recommendations I visited House of dentistry, Dwarka and met Dr Meenu who heard my problems at large and at that very moment I was convinced to give a start at this clinic.

She is extremely talented and does her job with no less than perfection. My entire treatment journey has been painless and very effective. I was described each and every process in detail and the methods here are very systematic to give an effective outcome. 
I got root canal treatments done where I lost the hope of saving the teeth but Dr meenu's efforts have helped my regain my confidence and saved natural teeth. 

For me she has been a saviour. 
I recommend her strongly to all those who are looking forward for a systematic approach and outcome based treatment options.  She is your final stop. 

Thanks Dr meenu for making me smile again.
reply_text:
Dear Patron
We are delighted to know that the treatment provided by Dr Meenu Dhiman effectively relieved your toothache and you are fully satisfied with our services. Your recommendation is the greatest compliment we could receive, and we are honoured to have earned your trust.
If you have any further questions, concerns, or dental needs in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We are here to assist you every step of the way and just a call away from you.
Kind Regards
House of Dentistry
Dwarka

review:
Review for House of Dentistry:

I recently had the pleasure of visiting House of Dentistry for my dental treatment, and I must say that Dr. Meenu Dhiman and her team provided me with an exceptional experience. From the moment I entered the clinic, I felt welcomed and at ease.

Dr. Meenu Dhiman is undoubtedly one of the best dentists I have come across. Her expertise and skill in providing dental treatments are truly commendable. I had to undergo a root canal treatment, and she made sure it was a painless experience for me. Her gentle approach and precision in handling the procedure were remarkable. I didn't experience any discomfort throughout the process, which is a testament to her expertise.

One of the most impressive aspects of House of Dentistry is the affordability they offer without compromising on the quality of the treatment. The pricing is fair and reasonable, which is quite refreshing in today's healthcare landscape. I appreciate that they prioritise providing affordable dental care without compromising on the excellence of their services.

Moreover, the best thing that I liked about House of Dentistry was their strict adherence to sterilization protocols. Dr. Meenu Dhiman ensures that all instruments are sterilized and maintained hygienically. This attention to detail regarding sterilization practises provides a sense of security and safety for patients.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your dental experience with us. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive and satisfactory visit to our dental practice.

At House of Dentistry by Dr Meenu Dhiman, our primary goal is to provide exceptional dental care while ensuring the comfort and well-being of our patients. Your kind words serve as a great encouragement to our entire team, as we continuously strive to deliver the highest quality of dental services. We continuously invest in the latest advancements in dentistry to ensure that our patients receive the most advanced treatments available. 

Kind Regards
House of dentistry
Dwarka

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Meenu and her clinic gave me perfect solutions and attention to detail along with personal after care attention as well. She's very understanding, accommodating and considerate while giving the best possible solution to the patient, keeping the patient's well being at priority. Dr. Meenu is extremely precise as well.
reply_text:
Dear Shiwangi
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback means a lot to our team.
Providing personalized care and ensuring our patients' well-being is indeed our top priority. We were extremely relieved to send you to your native town symptomfree after painless wisdom tooth removal/ tooth impaction treatment.
Your kind words about resonate deeply with our commitment to delivering the best possible care to each patient visiting House of Dentistry.
We're here for you every step of the way, even after your visit, to ensure your continued satisfaction and well-being.
Please don't hesitate to reach out.
Regards

review: I had a problem in my tooth for which I got RCT done.. but guess not done properly so I got infected again. I showed to so many dentists.. everyone was sceptical about the outcome as re RCT is complicated.. I came across Dr Meenu..  She is so good with her work, she did my Re RCT... She saved my tooth.. the experience was so smooth.. she keeps comforting you through out the process... I must say i have found the best dentist for myself and my family.. i highly recommend her to all who wants to be in safe hands... She has an extremely good behaviour ..
reply_text:
Dear patron
Thank you for choosing House of Dentistry. We extend our heartfelt gratitude for recommending House of Dentistry based on your personal experience. Positive word-of-mouth is the greatest compliment to us!
We look forward to serving you and your family for many years to come..:)
Best Regards

review:
Have recently been to this clinic in dwarka for which I got  high recommendations from my relatives. 
Got dental implants and multiple root canal treatments done under able guidance of Dr meenu and her support team who carried the treatment with ease and made sure that quality rendered is top notch. 

I have been to multiple clinics before but this time I can vouch that my case was handled keeping the standard of care that I expected and the comfort that I desired. 

I never knew dental treatments were this painless.
I thank Dr meenu for her dedication towards our dental health. 



Recommended all the way.
reply_text:
Dear Patron 
Thank you for your feedback. We are truely delighted to hear such appreciating words from you. At House of Dentistry we strive hard to build a trust with our patients and provide them the best. 
Glad we have added another happy patient to our list.
We are always just a call away.
Regards
House of Dentistry

review:
I went to House of Dentistry by Dr Meenu Dhiman upon reference by my neighbour. I had been suffering from tooth ache since long and had been controlling my problem with antibiotics and painkillers. I visited this clinic and doctor explained my problem in detail and also discussed the whole treatment plan with me. I felt comfortable after talking to Dr Meenu and immediately sat for treatment after knowing the I'll effects of consuming unnecessary antibiotics. To my surprise even after the treatment I was not prescribed any antibiotics but only mild painkillers. My problem is perfectly cured and the side that I had not been using since one and a half years to chew now I can eat from that side also.
I highly recommend this clinic in Dwarka Sec 9 for any dental problems.
reply_text:
Dear Patron
It gives us immense pleasure to know that you are now able to resume eating from your affected side of mouth. Your successful outcome serves as a testament to the importance of professional dental care. 
Also, we appreciate your kind recommendation of our clinic in Dwarka Sec 9 for any dental concerns. Your feedback with words of praise motivate us to continue delivering exceptional care to all our patients.

Kind Regards
House of Dentistry
Dwarka

review: My son had his new teeth in mouth while the milk teeth did not shed. New teeth erupted on the inner side of the milk teeth. Concerned we visited House of Dentistry. Dr Meenu removed both the teeth and my child was comfortable. Thanks to the team.
